983480.name: Lost Artifacts Soundtrack
983480.description:
Dear friend!
Have you ever dreamt about being in a world of lost artifacts and feeling like one of the characters?! You can go on a trip to the world of Lost Artifacts at any time!
We have collected for you awesome soundtracks, which will help to feel the atmosphere of a magical journey.

List of soundtracks that will lead you into world of lost artifacts:
Track 1 - 01:51
Track 2 - 01:55
Track 3 - 01:55
Track 4 - 01:59
Track 5 - 01:47

Note:
All soundtrack are in the format .mp3
Album's soundtrack will be placed in a folder containing the game Lost Artifacts.
983480.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 俄语
